post.body: I love making mix CDs. My mom used to fuss at me for how many blank CDs I was "wasting."
Come to Alabama? We've got 70 degree weather right now. I shit you not.
Psh. You don't need to be to have one. Best. Phone. Ever. At least, the Bold is.
Woo! Sounds like we both had a good new year haha.
Never get into the catering industry.
Agreed. It wasn't a balanced argument at all & seemed (to me) more aimed @ making fun of religious ppl.
Yep. The price paid for working in retail. :(
Yay! I got a Christmas card in the mail today!
Currently 78F and Partly Cloudy. STOP IT. STUPID WEATHER.
I'm starting to get a headache from all this heat. Granted, heat is relative, but still. Too. Freaking. Hot. For. December.
Currently 73F and Mostly Cloudy.
Bored. Mail still isn't here yet, but it's not quite 1pm so I can't get bitchy about their slowness yet.
Mail should be here soon, hopefully within the next hour. Jennifer's Christmas present SHOULD be here today.
...It's 73 degrees outside.
And, as is natural, Mr. Irons dies a horribly bloody death.
Jeremy Irons does this weird little eye-bugging thing that makes me want to laugh every time I see it.
Lolol this lady's got a breast plate that looks like something Madonna would have worn in the 80s.
Jeremy Irons looks pissed. I wonder who he's about to kill lol.
And also: Jeremy Irons. He just walked onscreen lol.
It involves some dude wearing blue lipstick, another dude who's an overactor, and a Wayans brother.
I can't figure out what the heck I'm watching on TV right now.
Home. Bought a candied apple that's three times bigger than my fist. Whoa.
My AIM signed me out. Grr.
My wifi went wonky. I don't think it liked me talking on the phone while I surfed.
No, apparently it is not the router. :/
Why is crackberry.com running so freaking slow today? Is it my wireless router?!
I'm freaking cold and shivering, and I don't know why, cause it's not that cold in here. :/
Not too much longer before I get to go home!
Well, 2009 is off to a good start for me so far. I spent the majority of the day sleeping. :D
It's about time for me to crawl out of bed. I've slept pretty much all day already.
So apparently it's freezing outside. Ugh.
Free! I'm free!
Happy New Year, CST!
Fifteen minutes til 2009 hits!
Busteddd. If you're underage and trying to shoplift beer, you probably shouldn't do it in your H.S. letter jacket.
At work now. So far there's only three of us here. O.o
"Dopeyokel" = best insult ever. Thanks, Mom. Lolz.
I'm probably going to regret this lack of sleep thing later tonight.
I really should be getting up right about now.
"Feds Investigate Airplane Brawl; Man covered in feces." Ew.
